name: Cecilius
description:
A story-driven adventure game about a boy named Cecilius who always looks for the true feelings but everything goes hollow after all. This is his adventure inside his heart to fulfill his emotion.

Control:

- Arrow keys to move

- Space/X to jump

- E to interact

The game is under development and this is the very first prototype. All comments and reviews are sincerely appreciated from you guys ^^

(of course, it's still buggy :<)
